about_the_game:
Primordialis is a physics-based roguelike fish builder. Unleash your creativity to defeat creatures using venomous tentacles, electrical shocks, or exploding children. The possibilities are endless. Explore the primordial depths to reveal its secrets and discover what lies beyond.

================================== Grow ==================================

Use the simple but flexible creature creation system to become anything you want.

Draw your creature using a wide variety of cell types which each have a unique function.

Combine different cells to construct your own weapons, defenses, and mobility.

Decorate your creature with custom coloring.

================================= Survive =================================

Overcome enemies and environmental hazards to grow larger and advance.

Defeat bosses to gain powerful game-changing mutations.

You can rely on quick reflexes to kill enemies in fast paced combat, or allow your fish designing prowess to carry you through.

================================= Explore =================================

The world is an interconnected web of biomes that is randomly generated to make every run a unique experience.

Linear progression is mixed with free exploration to allow you to fully exploit your environment.
